Shonen.description: Action-packed anime featuring young male protagonists, battles, and friendship.

Jujutsu Kaisen.description: Yuji Itadori fights curses and seeks to control the King of Curses, Sukuna.

Chainsaw Man.description: Denji, a young man, merges with a chainsaw demon to hunt devils.

Demon Slayer.description: Tanjiro Kamado hunts demons after his family is slaughtered.

One Piece.description: Luffy seeks to become the Pirate King and reach the One Piece treasure.

My Hero Academia.description: Izuku Midoriya trains to become the greatest hero.

Attack on Titan.description: Eren Yeager leads humanity’s fight against the Titans.

Black Clover.description: Asta and Yuno compete to become the Wizard King.

Kaiju No. 8.description: Kafka Hibino gains kaiju powers to fight against monsters.

Boruto: Two Blue Vortex.description: Boruto protects the Hidden Leaf against new threats.

Sakamoto Days.description: A legendary hitman turned family man is dragged back into the underworld.

Isekai.description: Anime where characters are transported to another world.

Solo Leveling.description: Jin-Woo gains extraordinary powers and becomes the strongest hunter.

Mushoku Tensei.description: A reincarnated man in a magical world seeks redemption.

The Rising of the Shield Hero.description: Naofumi, betrayed, fights as the Shield Hero.

Eminence in Shadow.description: A boy unknowingly creates a real secret organization.

That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime.description: A man reborn as a slime builds a new world.

Re:Zero.description: Subaru can rewind time but faces intense suffering.

Arifureta.description: A bullied student becomes overpowered after being abandoned in a dungeon.

Tsukimichi: Moonlit Fantasy.description: A boy abandoned by a goddess creates his own path.

Fantasy.description: Magical worlds filled with mystical creatures and heroes.

Fate/Strange Fake.description: A Holy Grail War unfolds in a city full of mages.

The Witch and the Beast.description: A dark fantasy with witches and curses.

Hell’s Paradise.description: Criminals search for immortality on a deadly island.

Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End.description: An elven mage reflects on life after outliving her comrades.

Berserk.description: A warrior seeks vengeance and fights his tragic fate.

The Ancient Magus' Bride.description: A girl with rare magic is taken in by a sorcerer.

Record of Ragnarok.description: The gods battle against humanity’s strongest warriors.

Tower of God.description: A boy climbs a mysterious tower full of trials.

Ragna Crimson.description: A dragon hunter fights an apocalyptic invasion.

Vinland Saga.description: A Viking warrior seeks revenge and redemption.

Sci-Fi.description: Futuristic settings, advanced technology, and space adventures.

Steins;Gate.description: A scientist accidentally discovers time travel.

Cowboy Bebop.description: Bounty hunters travel through space seeking adventure.

Ghost in the Shell.description: A cyber-enhanced agent investigates cyber crimes.

Trigun.description: A pacifist gunman with a huge bounty is pursued.

Psycho-Pass.description: A world where crimes are predicted before they happen.

Psychological.description: Anime that explores deep and intense psychological themes.

Death Note.description: A student gains a notebook that lets him kill anyone.

Monster.description: A doctor hunts a serial killer he once saved.

The Promised Neverland.description: Orphans uncover a dark secret about their world.

Erased.description: A man goes back in time to prevent a murder.

Madoka Magica.description: A dark twist on the magical girl genre.

Romance.description: Love stories filled with emotions, drama, and heartfelt moments.

Your Lie in April.description: A pianist rediscovers his love for music through a girl.

Toradora!.description: Two students with crushes help each other win love.

Clannad.description: A boy helps a lonely girl rediscover happiness.

Comedy.description: Humorous anime with absurd situations and lighthearted storytelling.

Spy x Family.description: A spy creates a fake family for a mission.

Bocchi the Rock!.description: A shy girl finds confidence through music.

Nichijou.description: A surreal comedy with bizarre everyday moments.

Grand Blue.description: College students engage in wild diving club antics.

Gintama.description: A samurai and his friends take odd jobs in a world invaded by aliens.

Asobi Asobase.description: Three eccentric girls create a weird after-school club.

KonoSuba.description: A hilarious isekai parody with a dysfunctional party.

Sports.description: Anime that focuses on competition, teamwork, and the personal growth of athletes in various sports.

Blue Lock.description: Japan’s best soccer prospects compete to become the ultimate striker.

Haikyuu!!.description: A determined volleyball player and his team strive to reach the top.

Slam Dunk.description: A delinquent joins a high school basketball team to impress a girl.

Horror.description: Anime that focuses on terrifying situations, psychological horror, and supernatural elements.

Another.description: A cursed classroom leads to mysterious and gruesome deaths.

Higurashi: When They Cry.description: A small village harbors dark secrets and recurring tragedies.

Parasyte.description: A teenager fights for survival when parasites begin taking over human bodies.

Mecha.description: Anime that features giant robots piloted by humans in futuristic settings.

Neon Genesis Evangelion.description: Teenagers pilot giant mechs to fight monstrous beings known as Angels.

Gurren Lagann.description: A young man joins a rebellion against a tyrannical ruler in a mech-driven world.

Code Geass.description: A strategic genius gains the power to command anyone and leads a revolution.

Slice of Life.description: Anime focusing on the everyday lives and personal experiences of characters.

March Comes in Like a Lion.description: A young shogi player navigates personal struggles and relationships.
